name: CUB3
description:
A tiny game that I made for a jam a few months ago. It is an arcade jumper, where you must match your color and color of a platform. Eventually, the pressure rises, and things start to get faster and faster. 

You can play it in your browser or download the desktop version, enjoy. Also, I would greatly appreciate any feedback!

Controls:

Space - Jump

W - Color switch

Esc - Exit (on desktop)
